No comment provided

h4.mmdsXBOX (AKA memMonitorDisplayXMemStats) (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_mmdsXBOX_UtilitiesLib]

h4.timerRecordEnd (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_timerRecordEnd_UtilitiesLib]
Stops any current profiler recording or playback


h4.timerRecordPlay (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_timerRecordPlay_UtilitiesLib]
*Parameter 1: filename (string)*
Plays back previously recorded profiler information, at the given filename


h4.timerRecordStart (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_timerRecordStart_UtilitiesLib]
*Parameter 1: filename (string)*
Starts recording profiling information to the given filename
